categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: Provincial Problems is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. The adventure takes smuggler and free-trader characters on a mission to deliver power fence generators to the Chekkoo Province on the jungle planet Rodia while evading the Chattza military forces of the Rodian Grand Protector.
